mapper.select: SELECT yip.PERSON_NAME as pname, yip.PERSON_PHONE as pphone, yic.COMPANY_NAME as cname, ysi.SCHOOL_ID as schoolId, ysi.INSURANCE_TYPE as insuranceType FROM yc_insurance_person AS yip INNER JOIN yc_insurance_company AS yic ON yip.COMPANY_ID = yic.ID INNER JOIN yc_school_insured as ysi ON ysi.INSURANCE_PERSON_ID = yip.ID where ysi.SCHOOL_ID = #{schoolId}
